ygData.messageBody:
question about pages:

i havent tried any yet, but do you need to have the left and right half of
the pages, or just two pages that say "part of page 23 of tasarin's
grimoire"? i ask cause i dont wanna waste any pages i have...

Qorona of the Volition Guild, 18th lvl enchanter on Cazic-Thule
